attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask that Warmfront be scrapped and replaced with a new scheme: this scheme should use a holistic approach to energy efficiency; include everyone who private rents their property and are on benefits; caps the total costs that can be charged by installers so that the customer truly obtains the work for free; runs this at a local level; and is accountable directly to one local MP within each County.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
